name: Galerie Isabelle Gounod
profile:
Since its opening in 2004, the gallery is aiming to present artist's works exploring different cultural disciplines and media. The gallery supports and accompanies artists' projects through an open and cross-disciplinary programming (painting, drawing, photography, video, performances and installations), working with different generations, confirmed artists as well as promising emerging artists, all mostly issued from the french scene.

Isabelle Gounod belongs throughout few generations to a family of artists, musicians, painters, photographers, film and TV directors, poets and writers. After art studies and ten years working in the theatre mainly in London during the eighties, back in France she joined the film and documentary production. She founded the gallery in 2004 in Boulogne-Billancourt nearby Paris, and opened in june 2008 the new space in Paris.
